name: Shaky Structures
description:
A construction game based on verlet simulation.

Instructions

Select your tool on the right of the screen. Click on points to start drawing. Click on the Build button to validate.

If you are stuck you can easily reload the level by opening the level selection (the cog at the top right corner)

Controls

Select: Left click Move cam: Right click Zoom: Mouse wheel Build shortcut: Spacebar
